content.question: Two small spheres with charges of <math alttext="positive Q" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>Q</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="negative Q" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>âˆ’</mo><mi>Q</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> are held fixed along the <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-axis, as shown above. Points <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> on the axis are also shown. Which of the following correctly compares the electric potential <math alttext="V" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and the magnitude <math alttext="E" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> of the electric field at the two points?

choices.label: <math alttext="V sub A, is greater than V sub B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="E sub A, is greater than E sub B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="V sub A, is greater than V sub B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="E sub B, is greater than E sub A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="V sub B, is greater than V sub A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="E sub A, is greater than E sub B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="V sub B, is greater than V sub A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="E sub B, is greater than E sub A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="V sub A, is greater than V sub B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="E sub B, is greater than E sub A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
